channel.title: [508] Needing help with portfowarding and help to connect others to server [508]
channel.description:
Ok, me and my friend need help over team viewer. The computer you will be working with will be his computer and I will give you details on his Teamviewer ID and Password for connection. I will post some details below that will help you with portfowarding and making it so we can host players and so they can connect.
Current Router: Linksys [CISCO]
Picture of the router: http://giocomputer.com/store/images/92311_1.jpg
Router Number: wrt120n
We are using No-Ip. If you need any other further information post below and we would really like the help to get this server up. Thanks! :)
